summary: An undercover policewoman helps three female convicts escape from prison so that they can lead her to a stash of stolen diamonds hidden in a swamp.
cast: Marie Windsor|Carole Mathews|Beverly Garland|Mike Connors|Susan Cummings|Lou Place|Jonathan Haze|Ed Nelson|Jil Jarmyn
keywords: women's prison|prison break|girl gang|hostage taking|b movie
title: Swamp Women
